data.actual_result: Languages outside of English revert back to the old Invite modal after refreshing your client
data.expected_result: Languages outside of English have the new Invite modal
data.short_description: Invite modal reverts back to the old modal upon refreshing after switching your client language from English to another (even ones with fully approved strings for the modal)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have your client language set to English - Switch your client language to French - Open the Invite modal to observe the new modal and then refresh and re-observe as the old modal
